AudioProcessingEvent.summary: IMPORTANT Deprecated The AudioProcessingEvent interface of the Web Audio API represents events that occur when a input buffer is ready to be processed.

remarks.para: An audioprocess event with this interface is fired on a when audio processing is required. During audio processing, the input buffer is read and processed to produce output audio data, which is then written to the output buffer.

blockquote.para: This feature has been deprecated and should be replaced by an AudioWorklet.
